item.title: Issue not fixed, 3rd September
item.description:
This issue has been reported a month ago. the case was closed and declared fixed. I took an image on the 2nd September and it is still just as bad.... Why do i need to pay more and more council tax? for things to keep decreasing...

item.title: Tree hanging low outside 221 Croydon road beckenham br3, 3rd September
item.description:
This tree has been hanging low for months now and yesterday I walked to the side to avoid branches hanging low and bumped into neighbouring houses rubbish bin on pathway didn’t see it as I was ducking past tree please prune
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 237, Croydon Road, Beckenham, London

item.title: Barriers preventing wheelchair access, 3rd September
item.description:
The use of this path between Timber Pond Road and Beatson Walk has two barriers both of which prevent the path being used by wheelchair users. This is discrimination and needs to be removed.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Timber Pond Road, Rotherhithe, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fridge Dumped on Pavement – Safety Hazard on Wheathill Road, 3rd September
item.description:
An old fridge has been flytipped on the pavement at Wheathill Road, right by the usual hotspot. It’s lying on its side, partially blocking the path and posing a serious risk to pedestrians, especially in poor light or wet conditions. This recurring dumping is unacceptable — someone will get hurt if this continues to be ignored.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Wheathill Road, Anerley, London
Report on FixMyStreet
